name: International Jetpack Conference
description:
Sixteen-color ASCII meditation on assignment journalism, the military-industrial complex, and the spirit of music. A return to ZZT, the DOS-based game-creation platform through which this game's authors met in the early nineties. Made with Allison Parrish in 2014.

How to play

  1. Click "Run Game" above. Marvel at the modern miracle of DOS booting up in a web browser.
  2. When prompted, choose "K" for Keyboard input and "C" for Color display. The game will load and you'll see the title screen. Press "P" to play. 
  3. From here, just use the arrow keys to walk around, and bump into things to interact with them. The rest is up to you!

International Jetpack Conference received an Honorable Mention in the 2015 Independent Games Festival's Nuovo Category.
